body:
The installation instruction of PowerShell Core 6.0 for Ubuntu 16.04 is below.
https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/installation/linux.md#ubuntu-1604

And the installation instruction of .NET Core SDK is below.
https://www.microsoft.com/net/learn/get-started/linuxubuntu

The scripts for registering key and package sources in these documents are different.
If they are practically the same, please unify either.
